Ability Capsule.description: A capsule that allows a Pokémon with two Abilities to switch between these Abilities when it is used.

Abomasite.description: Enables Abomasnow to Mega Evolve during battle.

Absolite.description: Enables Absol to Mega Evolve during battle.

Absorb Bulb.description: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.

Adamant Orb.description: Increases the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves when held by Dialga.

Adrenaline Orb.description: Using it makes wild Pokémon more likely to call for help. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.

Aerodactylite.description: Enables Aerodactyl to Mega Evolve during battle.

Aggronite.description: Enables Aggron to Mega Evolve during battle.

Air Balloon.description: When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.

Alakazite.description: Enables Alakazam to Mega Evolve during battle.

Aloraichium Z.description: Allows Alolan Raichu to upgrade Thunderbolt to a Z-Move, Stoked Sparksurfer.

Altarianite.description: Enables Altaria to Mega Evolve during battle.

Ampharosite.description: Enables Ampharos to Mega Evolve during battle.

Assault Vest.description: Raises Special Defense but prevents the use of status moves.

Audinite.description: Enables Audino to Mega Evolve during battle.

Banettite.description: Enables Banette to Mega Evolve during battle.

Beedrillite.description: Enables Beedrill to Mega Evolve during battle.

Berry Sweet.description: Evolves Milcery into Blueberry Flavor Alcremie.

Big Root.description: Recovers more HP from HP-stealing moves.

Binding Band.description: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.

Black Belt.description: Increases the power of Fighting-type moves.

Black Glasses.description: Increases the power of Dark-type moves.

Black Sludge.description: A held item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

Blastoisinite.description: Enables Blastoise to Mega Evolve during battle.

Blazikenite.description: Enables Blaziken to Mega Evolve during battle.

Blunder Policy.description: Raises Speed sharply if its attack misses.

Bug Gem.description: Increases the power of a Bug-type move only once.

Bug Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Bug type.

Buginium Z.description: Allows the use of Savage Spin-Out, the Bug type Z-Move.

Burn Drive.description: Changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move when held by Genesect.

Cameruptite.description: Enables Camerupt to Mega Evolve during battle.

Cell Battery.description: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

Charcoal.description: Increases the power of Fire-type moves.

Charizardite X.description: Enables Charizard to Mega Evolve during battle.

Charizardite Y.description: Enables Charizard to Mega Evolve during battle.

Chill Drive.description: Changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move when held by Genesect.

Choice Band.description: Raises Attack, but only one move can be used.

Choice Scarf.description: Raises Speed, but only one move can be used.

Choice Specs.description: Raises Special Attack, but only one move can be used.

Cleanse Tag.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the first one in the party.

Clover Sweet.description: Evolves Milcery into Clover Flavor Alcremie.

Covert Cloak.description: Conceals the holder, protecting it from the additional effects of moves.

Damp Rock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.

Dark Gem.description: Increases the power of a Dark-type move only once.

Dark Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Dark type.

Darkinium Z.description: Allows the use of Black Hole Eclipse, the Dark type Z-Move.

Decidium Z.description: Allows Decidueye to upgrade Spirit Shackle to a Z-Move, Sinister Arrow Raid.

Deep Sea Scale.description: Increases Special Defense when held by Clamperl. Evolves Clamperl when traded holding the item.

Deep Sea Tooth.description: Increases Special Attack when held by Clamperl. Evolves Clamperl when traded holding the item.

Destiny Knot.description: A long, thin, bright-red string to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

Diancite.description: Enables Diancie to Mega Evolve during battle.

Douse Drive.description: Changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move when held by Genesect.

Draco Plate.description: Increases power of Dragon-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Dragon.

Dragon Fang.description: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves.

Dragon Gem.description: Increases the power of a Dragon-type move only once.

Dragon Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Dragon type.

Dragonium Z.description: Allows the use of Devastating Drake, the Dragon type Z-Move.

Dread Plate.description: Increases power of Dark-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Dark.

Dropped Item.description: The Xtransceiver found at the Nimbasa City amusement park. It seems it belongs to a boy.

Earth Plate.description: Increases power of Ground-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Ground.

Eevium Z.description: Allows Eevee to upgrade Last Resort to a Z-Move, Extreme Evoboost.

Eject Button.description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.

Eject Pack.description: The Pokémon switches out if its stats are lowered.

Electric Gem.description: Increases the power of an Electric-type move only once.

Electric Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Electric type.

Electric Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

Electrium Z.description: Allows the use of Gigavolt Havoc, the Electric type Z-Move.

Elevator Key.description: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare's logo.

Everstone.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

Eviolite.description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokémon that can still evolve.

Exp. Share.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder gets a share of a battle's Exp. Points without battling.

Expert Belt.description: Increases the power of super-effective moves.

Fairium Z.description: Allows the use of Twinkle Tackle, the Fairy type Z-Move.

Fairy Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Fairy type.

Fighting Gem.description: Increases the power of a Fighting-type move only once.

Fighting Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Fighting type.

Fightinium Z.description: Allows the use of All-Out Pummeling, the Fighting type Z-Move.

Fire Gem.description: Increases the power of a Fire-type move only once.

Fire Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Fire type.

Firium Z.description: Allows the use of Inferno Overdrive, the Fire type Z-Move.

Fist Plate.description: Increases power of Fighting-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Fighting.

Flame Orb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.

Flame Plate.description: Increases power of Fire-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Fire.

Float Stone.description: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

Flower Sweet.description: Evolves Milcery into Flower Flavor Alcremie.

Flying Gem.description: Increases the power of a Flying-type move only once.

Flying Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Flying type.

Flyinium Z.description: Allows the use of Supersonic Skystrike, the Flying type Z-Move.

Focus Band.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

Focus Sash.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

Full Incense.description: Holder always attacks last. Breeding Snorlax produces Munchlax when held.

Galladite.description: Enables Gallade to Mega Evolve during battle.

Garchompite.description: Enables Garchomp to Mega Evolve during battle.

Gardevoirite.description: Enables Gardevoir to Mega Evolve during battle.

Gengarite.description: Enables Gengar to Mega Evolve during battle.

Ghost Gem.description: Increases the power of a Ghost-type move only once.

Ghost Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Ghost type.

Ghostium Z.description: Allows the use of Never-Ending Nightmare, the Ghost type Z-Move.

Glalitite.description: Enables Glalie to Mega Evolve during battle.

Grass Gem.description: Increases the power of a Grass-type move only once.

Grass Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Grass type.

Grassium Z.description: Allows the use of Bloom Doom, the Grass type Z-Move.

Grassy Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.

Grip Claw.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.

Griseous Orb.description: Increases the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves when held by Giratina, and changes it to Origin Forme.

Grit Dust.description: Raises EVs by 1 in Legends: Arceus, when current EVs are between 0-2.

Grit Gravel.description: Raises EVs by 1 in Legends: Arceus, when current EVs are between 3-5.

Grit Pebble.description: Raises EVs by 1 in Legends: Arceus, when current EVs are between 6-8.

Grit Rock.description: Raises EVs by 1 in Legends: Arceus, when current EVs are between 8-9.

Ground Gem.description: Increases the power of a Ground-type move only once.

Ground Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Ground type.

Groundium Z.description: Allows the use of Tectonic Rage, the Ground type Z-Move.

Grubby Hanky.description: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.

Gyaradosite.description: Enables Gyarados to Mega Evolve during battle.

Hard Stone.description: Increases the power of Rock-type moves.

Heat Rock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Sunny Day used by the holder.

Heavy-Duty Boots.description: Protects the holder from traps set on the battlefield.

Heracronite.description: Enables Heracross to Mega Evolve during battle.

Hi-tech Earbuds.description: Strange earbuds that allow you to freely control the volume of various sounds.

Honor Of Kalos.description: A precious symbol that is awarded only to an individual who has done great things for the Kalos region.

Houndoominite.description: Enables Houndoom to Mega Evolve during battle.

Ice Gem.description: Increases the power of an Ice-type move only once.

Ice Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Ice type.

Icicle Plate.description: Increases power of Ice-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Ice.

Icium Z.description: Allows the use of Subzero Slammer, the Ice type Z-Move.

Icy Rock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Hail used by the holder.

Incinium Z.description: Allows Incineroar to upgrade Darkest Lariat to a Z-Move, Malicious Moonsault.

Insect Plate.description: Increases power of Bug-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Bug.

Intriguing Stone.description: A rather curious stone that might appear to be valuable to some. It's all in the eye of the beholder.

Iron Ball.description: A Pokémon held item that cuts Speed. It makes Flying-type and levitating holders susceptible to Ground moves.

Iron Plate.description: Increases power of Steel-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Steel.

Kangaskhanite.description: Enables Kangaskhan to Mega Evolve during battle.

King's Rock.description: May cause opponent to flinch. Evolves Poliwhirl and Slowpoke when traded holding the item.

Kommonium Z.description: Allows Kommo-o to upgrade Clanging Scales to a Z-Move, Clangorous Soulblaze.

Latiasite.description: Enables Latias to Mega Evolve during battle.

Latiosite.description: Enables Latios to Mega Evolve during battle.

Lax Incense.description: Lowers the opponent's accuracy. Breeding Wobbuffet produces Wynaut when held.

Leek.description: Increases critical-hit ratio when held by Farfetch'd.

Leftovers.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is gradually restored during battle.

Life Orb.description: Increases the power of moves, but loses HP each turn.

Light Ball.description: An item to be held by PIKACHU. It is a puzzling orb that raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stat.

Light Clay.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of barrier moves like Light Screen and Reflect used by the holder.

Loaded Dice.description: Makes multi-strike moves more likely to hit more times.

Looker Ticket.description: A ticket that was handmade by Looker. It's decorated with a liberal amount of glittery paint.

Lopunnite.description: Enables Lopunny to Mega Evolve during battle.

Love Sweet.description: Evolves Milcery into Heart Flavor Alcremie.

Lucarionite.description: Enables Lucario to Mega Evolve during battle.

Luck Incense.description: Doubles prize money if held. Breeding Chansey or Blissey produces Happiny when held.

Lucky Egg.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.

Lucky Punch.description: Increases critical-hit ratio when held by Chansey.

Luminous Moss.description: Raises Special Defense if hit by a Water-type move.

Lunalium Z.description: Allows Lunala to upgrade Moongeist Beam to a Z-Move, Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom.

Lustrous Orb.description: Increases the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves when held by Palkia.

Lycanium Z.description: Allows Lycanroc to upgrade Stone Edge to a Z-Move, Splintered Stormshards.

Macho Brace.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stiff and heavy brace that promotes strong growth but lowers Speed.

Magnet.description: Increases the power of Electric-type moves.

Manectite.description: Enables Manectric to Mega Evolve during battle.

Marshadium Z.description: Allows Marshadow to upgrade Spectral Thief to a Z-Move, Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike.

Mawilite.description: Enables Mawile to Mega Evolve during battle.

Meadow Plate.description: Increases power of Grass-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Grass.

Medichamite.description: Enables Medicham to Mega Evolve during battle.

Mental Herb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It snaps the holder out of infatuation. It can be used only once.

Metagrossite.description: Enables Metagross to Mega Evolve during battle.

Metal Coat.description: Increases the power of Steel-type moves. Evolves Onix and Scyther when traded holding the item.

Metal Powder.description: Increases Defense when held by Ditto.

Metronome.description: Increases the power of moves used consecutively.

Mewnium Z.description: Allows Mew to upgrade Psychic to a Z-Move, Genesis Supernova.

Mewtwonite X.description: Enables Mewtwo to Mega Evolve during battle.

Mewtwonite Y.description: Enables Mewtwo to Mega Evolve during battle.

Mimikium Z.description: Allows Mimikyu to upgrade Play Rough to a Z-Move, Let's Snuggle Forever.

Mind Plate.description: Increases power of Psychic-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Psychic.

Miracle Seed.description: Increases the power of Grass-type moves.

Mirror Herb.description: Copies an opponent's stat increases when consumed.

Misty Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.

Muscle Band.description: Increases the power of Physical-category moves.

Mystic Water.description: Increases the power of Water-type moves.

Never-Melt Ice.description: Increases the power of Ice-type moves.

Normal Gem.description: Increases the power of a Normal-type move only once.

Normalium Z.description: Allows the use of Breakneck Blitz, the Normal type Z-Move.

Odd Incense.description: Increases the power of Psychic-type moves. Breeding Mr. Mime produces Mime Jr. when held.

Pass Orb.description: A mysterious orb containing the power of the Unova region, to be used when generating Pass Power.

Pidgeotite.description: Enables Pidgeot to Mega Evolve during battle.

Pikanium Z.description: Allows Pikachu to upgrade Volt Tackle to a Z-Move, Catastropika.

Pikashunium Z.description: Allows Pikachu in a cap to upgrade Thunderbolt to a Z-Move, 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.

Pink Nectar.description: The flower nectar obtained at the flowering shrubs on Royal Avenue. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Pinsirite.description: Enables Pinsir to Mega Evolve during battle.

Pixie Plate.description: Increases power of Fairy-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Fairy.

Plasma Card.description: A card key needed to enter the password inside the Plasma Frigate.

Poison Barb.description: Increases the power of Poison-type moves.

Poison Gem.description: Increases the power of a Poison-type move only once.

Poison Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Poison type.

Poisonium Z.description: Allows the use of Acid Downpour, the Poison type Z-Move.

Power Anklet.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Speed gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Band.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Sp. Def gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Belt.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Defense gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Bracer.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Herb.description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges on the first turn.

Power Lens.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Sp. Atk gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Power Plant Pass.description: This pass serves as an ID card for gaining access to the power plant that lies along Route 13.

Power Weight.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes HP gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

Primarium Z.description: Allows Primarina to upgrade Sparkling Aria to a Z-Move, Oceanic Operetta.

Prison Bottle.description: Transforms Hoopa Confined to Hoopa Unbound.

Prof's Letter.description: A letter that Professor Sycamore wrote to your mother. A faint but pleasant perfume seems to cling to the paper.

Protective Pads.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.

Psychic Gem.description: Increases the power of a Psychic-type move only once.

Psychic Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Psychic type.

Psychic Seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.

Psychium Z.description: Allows the use of Shattered Psyche, the Psychic type Z-Move.

Pure Incense.description: Descreases the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon. Breeding Chimecho produces Chingling when held.

Purple Nectar.description: A flower nectar obtained at Poni Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Quick Claw.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A light, sharp claw that lets the bearer move first occasionally.

Quick Powder.description: Increases Speed when held by Ditto.

Razor Claw.description: Increases critical-hit ratio. Evolves Sneasel when held at night.

Razor Fang.description: May cause opponent to flinch. Evolves Gligar when held at night.

Red Card.description: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.

Red Nectar.description: A flower nectar obtained at Ula'ula Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Ribbon Sweet.description: Evolves Milcery into Ribbon Flavor Alcremie.

Ring Target.description: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.

Rock Gem.description: Increases the power of a Rock-type move only once.

Rock Incense.description: Increases the power of Rock-type moves. Breeding Sudowoodo produces Bonsly when held.

Rock Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Rock type.

Rockium Z.description: Allows the use of Continental Crush, the Rock type Z-Move.

Rocky Helmet.description: If the holder of this item takes damage, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

Room Service.description: Lowers the Pokémon's speed during Trick Room.

Rose Incense.description: Increases the power of Grass-type moves. Breeding Roselia or Roserade produces Budew when held.

Sablenite.description: Enables Sableye to Mega Evolve during battle.

Safety Goggles.description: Prevents damage from weather and powder.

Salamencite.description: Enables Salamence to Mega Evolve during battle.

Sceptilite.description: Enables Sceptile to Mega Evolve during battle.

Scizorite.description: Enables Scizor to Mega Evolve during battle.

Sea Incense.description: Increases the power of Water-type moves. Breeding Marill or Azumarill produces Azurill when held.

Sharp Beak.description: Increases the power of Flying-type moves.

Sharpedonite.description: Enables Sharpedo to Mega Evolve during battle.

Shed Shell.description: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokémon in battle.

Shell Bell.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is restored a little every time it inflicts damage.

Shock Drive.description: Changes Techno Blast to an Electric-type move when held by Genesect.

Silk Scarf.description: Increases the power of Normal-type moves.

Silver Powder.description: Increases the power of Bug-type moves.

Sky Plate.description: Increases power of Flying-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Flying.

Slowbronite.description: Enables Slowbro to Mega Evolve during battle.

Smoke Ball.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon without fail.

Smooth Rock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Sandstorm used by the holder.

Snorlium Z.description: Allows Snorlax to upgrade Giga Impact to a Z-Move, Pulverizing Pancake.

Snowball.description: Raises Attack if hit by an Ice-type move.

Soft Sand.description: Increases the power of Ground-type moves.

Solganium Z.description: Allows Solgaleo to upgrade Sunsteel Strike to a Z-Move, Searing Sunraze Smash.

Soothe Bell.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bell with a comforting chime that calms the holder and makes it friendly.

Soul Dew.description: Increases the power of Psychic- and Dragon-type moves when held by Latios or Latias. Increases Sp.Atk/Sp.Def prior to Gen 7.

Spell Tag.description: Increases the power of Ghost-type moves.

Splash Plate.description: Increases power of Water-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Water.

Spooky Plate.description: Increases power of Ghost-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Ghost.

Star Sweet.description: Evolves Milcery into Star Flavor Alcremie.

Steel Gem.description: Increases the power of a Steel-type move only once.

Steel Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Steel type.

Steelium Z.description: Allows the use of Corkscrew Crash, the Steel type Z-Move.

Steelixite.description: Enables Steelix to Mega Evolve during battle.

Sticky Barb.description: A held item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to foes and allies that touch the holder.

Stone Plate.description: Increases power of Rock-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Rock.

Strawberry Sweet.description: Evolves Milcery into Strawberry Flavor Alcremie.

Swampertite.description: Enables Swampert to Mega Evolve during battle.

Tapunium Z.description: Allows the Tapus to upgrade Nature's Madness to a Z-Move, Guardian of Alola.

Terrain Extender.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder's move or Ability.

Thick Club.description: Increases Attack when held by Cubone or Marowak.

Throat Spray.description: Raises Sp. Atk when a sound-based move is used.

Toxic Orb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.

Toxic Plate.description: Increases power of Poison-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Poison.

Twisted Spoon.description: Increases the power of Psychic-type moves.

Tyranitarite.description: Enables Tyranitar to Mega Evolve during battle.

Ultranecrozium Z.description: Allows Ultra Necrozma to upgrade Photon Geyser to a Z-Move, Light That Burns the Sky.

Utility Umbrella.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sturdy umbrella protects the holder from the effects of weather.

Venusaurite.description: Enables Venusaur to Mega Evolve during battle.

Water Gem.description: Increases the power of a Water-type move only once.

Water Memory.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Water type.

Waterium Z.description: Allows the use of Hydro Vortex, the Water type Z-Move.

Wave Incense.description: Increases the power of Water-type moves. Breeding Mantine produces Mantyke when held.

Weakness Policy.description: Sharply raises Attack and Special Attack if hit by a super-effective move.

White Herb.description: An item to be held by a POKéMON. It restores any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

Wise Glasses.description: Increases the power of Special-category moves.

Yellow Nectar.description: A flower nectar obtained at Melemele Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Zap Plate.description: Increases power of Electric-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Electric.

Zoom Lens.description: Raises a move's accuracy if the holder moves after its target.
